teamId.description: The id of the Team to which the request is sent.

userId.description: The id of the user for whom membership is requested.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time a MembershipRequest is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of a MembershipRequest is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this MembershipRequest was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this MembershipRequest.
createdBy.title: Created By
